column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=One of my main points is to achieve a balanced budget , sooner not later , not five years down the road , not ten years down the road .
#Text=We need to do that now .
#Text=I also understand the need for secure borders .
#Text=And I am the only candidate that is in favor of totally stopping illegal immigration , and reducing legal immigration .
#Text=Immigration costs this country billions of dollars .
#Text=We should not be bringing in more green card holders while our unemployment rate is between eight and nine percent .
#Text=We need jobs in America , and U.S. citizens first , and not bring in so many from other countries that take jobs from U.S. citizens .
#Text=( ( WSS ) ) Why did you decide to join the Constitution Party and seek its nomination ?
#Text=Goode : I have been going to the National Committee meetings .
#Text=I am a member of the National Committee of the Constitution Party , and I 've attended about ten meetings .

#Text=The Constitution National Committee , unlike the Republican National Committee and unlike the Democratic National Committee , was willing to take a stand and support the Arizona legislation to counteract illegal immigration .
#Text=I think the federal government should be supportive of the efforts of states to deal with the problems , and of course the current administration does not .
#Text=And the Republican National Committee did not do a resolution supporting Arizona like the Constitution Party National Committee .
#Text=( ( WSS ) ) If you win the nomination , are you concerned you will take votes away from the Republicans and help re-elect Barack Obama ?
#Text=Goode :
#Text=No.
#Text=I think I ’ll take votes from Obama .
#Text=I just talked to the guy that filled my tanks with gas .
#Text=I ’ve known him for many years .
#Text=He ’s gonna vote for Obama — he was — but he says now , he ’s gonna vote for me .
#Text=So I think I ’ll take as many votes from Obama as I will from the Republican .
#Text=I think when people focus on our campaign , we ’re gonna get a lot of votes from both Democrats and Republicans .
#Text=My campaign is only taking donations of $ 200 and less .
#Text=That ’s a grassroots campaign .
#Text=Running a grassroots campaign should be very appealing to Democrats who do not favor the big money that ’s backing President Obama .
#Text=He ’s lowering the ethics with big PAC donations , and he has maximum limit donations , which I believe is about $ 10,000 per couple now .
#Text=Our limit is $ 200 , so I think we ’ll take votes from President Obama and with those who really want to balance the budget right away will vote with us too .
#Text=( ( WSS ) ) If you were elected in 2008 , what would you have done differently than Obama ?
#Text=Goode : I would not have pushed for Obamacare .

#Text=I would have secured the borders , stopped illegal immigration , reduced legal immigration , done away with diversity visas , supported legislation to stop automatic birthright citizenship for those born of illegals that come into this country .
#Text=And I would not have adopted the stimulus bill that he approved with all deficit spending .
#Text=There are many areas that need to be cut .
#Text=When I was in Congress , I was often among the lowest spenders of the Congressional expense money .
#Text=We need to do that across all levels of the federal government .
#Text=Instead of expanding government , we need to have less regulation , and encourage the private sector .
